com.collabnet.ccf.core.eis.connection
Interface ConnectionFactory<T>

Type Parameters:
T - - The Class of the connection object to the system that is connected.
All Known Implementing Classes:
CollabNetConnectionFactory, SFEEConnectionFactory
public interface ConnectionFactory<T>

Specifies the interface for the plugin provider to define how to obtain a connection to the system that he is connecting to.

Author:
madhusuthanan (madhusuthanan@collab.net)

isAlive

boolean isAlive(T connection)
Indicates if the connection is live or not. A connection is live if it can be used without resulting to any access denied status returned from the server.

Parameters:
connection - - The connection whose status to be checked
Returns:
- true if the connection is live false if the connection is stale.
